publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2162.1 Mr Adam Ingram: Erskine Bridge Tolls Bill-As an amendment to motion (S1M-2162) in the name of Sarah Boyack, insert at end "and calls on the Parliamentary Bureau to bring a motion to the Parliament under rule 9.21.5 of Standing Orders that the Bill is taken over more than one day." Supported by: Fiona Hyslop*
